overview:
Online Coaching and Training

We are glad to inform that online coaching and training has started at VaaYaa Education. Now students can learn at their place and pace without travelling. Online coaching will help students of BCA and MCA to learn required skills without leaving their place. Online training is available for PHP, ASP.NET, C, C++, Java, J2EE, Android, SEO, online reputation management, Flash Animation, Web Design, Wordpress, Joomla, Magento and for all other certification courses. We also provide live project training to IT students.

The training is in response to the feedback and demand from students and professional from US, UK, Europe and other many other countries. requirement from Online training started by considering huge demand of our quality training for the students and professional from US, UK, Europe and other countries.
